swakiya guru dewayan wahansege shri namaya sihiwima pinisa siri panynyadhara dharma widyalaya aarambha kara pradeshaye du daruwanta daham adhyapanaya hadarimata thothannak bawata path kara atha.kambaurupitiya ullala masmulla shri wimalananda yogashramadhipathi, pujya panditha mapalane nyanadhaja maha swamin wahanse sidu karana mema aagamika jathika samajika sewaya agaya karanu was swakiya nikaya wu amarapura siri saddhammawansa maha nikaye athigaru mahanayaka siri saddhammawansapala ganachariya mahopadhyaya ahungalle siri silawisuddhi maha nahimipanan wahanse pramukha “sudharma” nam karaka sangha sabhawe ekachchandayen mapalane nyanadhaja maha swamin wahanse wetha “siri saddhamma panynyadharawansawathansa shri saddhamma wagishwara” yana gaurawa nama sammuthiya sahithawa mathara palathe pradhana sanghanayaka padawiya pilibanda akthapathraya pasugiya da balapitiya mahakappina walawwa sima malaka wiharaye di pradanaya karana ladi.kolambaa 15, modara shri bodhisamudrarama wiharadhipathi, shasthrapathi, thumbae upananda himisinhala pali sanskrutha demala hindi aadi bhasha rasak pilibanda mana awabodhayak labagath unwahanse adhyapana aayathana kihipayakama sewaya kara atha.kolambaa kotahena paramananda piriwena, yatiyana wijayamangala, gampaha sama wiharaya yana widdhasthanayanhi sewaya kirimen anathuruwa nittambauwa sariputhra adhyapana widyapitaye kathikacharyawarayeku washayen da sewaya kara atha.unwahansege adhyapana kshethraye kapi penena dakshathawaya wuye demala bhashawa pilibanda dakwu nipunathawayayi.
eyata pilithuru dunne ohuge ata hawiridi diyaniya.pinthuraya gaththe :

eelangata mata wadiyenma danuna mathakaya hitapu janadhipathi ranasinha premadasage maranaya.aayeth ara ithihase musala andura ee dawasa wahagena pathirila hitiya..ethakota ape ammata nangiwa labenna hitiya..ammayi mamayi witharayi gedara hitiye.oya aaranchiya labeddi parisaraye thibbe maha kalakanni andurak..rupawahiniye rathu pasubime kaha salalihiniya dawasa mulullema hota bimata bagena musala wina wadanayak damma jathika shoka dinayak kiyala..paththare athata gaththama mama issellama dakke babuge olu gediya.eeka awurudu 7ka punchi ekage hithe athikala bhithikawa kochcharada kiyanawanam ammata siddha wuna thaththa enakal aaththammata awith api ekka nawathinna kiyanna.mokada thaththa langata mage wiraya wune aaththamma (ammage amma)..eeth adatath ee musala mayi palawenida danichcha dedarima sudu pata laks suwandak ekka muhuwela mata danenawa..mokada kochchara bhishanayak athare haduna waduna wunath mini kali mama dakke premadasage maranedi..
